General.Name: Shakti Pumps (India) Limited
General.Description: Shakti Pumps (India) Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of solar energy pumps and motors under the Shakti brand name in India. Its products include submersible, solar, vertical multistage centrifugal, monoblock end suction, pressure booster, wastewater, open well, shallow well and slow speed, immersible, solar openwell, micro smart, micro surface, horizontal split-case, firefighting, and plug and play pumps, as well as submersible, surface, and slip start synchronous motors. The company also provides solar pump controllers, solar drives, starters, inverters, RMS/IoT dongles, DU/DT filters, variable frequency drives, and hydro-pneumatic booster systems, as well as support services. Its pumps are used for agriculture, irrigation, industrial and process, pressure boosting in high rise building, rural/urban community water supply scheme, waste and sewage water treatment, and fire-fighting applications. The company also exports its products. Shakti Pumps (India) Limited was incorporated in 1982 and is headquartered in Pithampur, India.
